content.question: ​The function <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals negative 3 log subscript 2 x plus 1"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following limit statements describe the end behaviors of <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​​<math alttext="limit as x rightwards arrow 1 to the power of plus of f open parentheses x close parentheses equals negative infinity"><semantics><mrow><munder><mi>lim</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo></msup></mrow></munder><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="limit as x rightwards arrow infinity of f open parentheses x close parentheses equals infinity"><semantics><mrow><munder><mi>lim</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></munder><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​<math alttext="limit as x rightwards arrow 1 to the power of plus of f open parentheses x close parentheses equals infinity"><semantics><mrow><munder><mi>lim</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo></msup></mrow></munder><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="limit as x rightwards arrow infinity of f open parentheses x close parentheses equals negative infinity"><semantics><mrow><munder><mi>lim</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></munder><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​<math alttext="limit as x rightwards arrow 0 to the power of plus of f open parentheses x close parentheses equals negative infinity"><semantics><mrow><munder><mi>lim</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><msup><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo></msup></mrow></munder><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="limit as x rightwards arrow infinity of f open parentheses x close parentheses equals infinity"><semantics><mrow><munder><mi>lim</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></munder><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="limit as x rightwards arrow 0 to the power of plus of f open parentheses x close parentheses equals infinity"><semantics><mrow><munder><mi>lim</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><msup><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo></msup></mrow></munder><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="limit as x rightwards arrow infinity of f open parentheses x close parentheses equals negative infinity"><semantics><mrow><munder><mi>lim</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></munder><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="limit as x rightwards arrow 0 to the power of plus of f open parentheses x close parentheses equals infinity"><semantics><mrow><munder><mi>lim</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><msup><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo></msup></mrow></munder><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="limit as x rightwards arrow infinity of f open parentheses x close parentheses equals negative infinity"><semantics><mrow><munder><mi>lim</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></munder><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
